data.lyric:
[ti:This Is It]
[ar:Scotty McCreery]
[al:Seasons Change]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]This Is It - Scotty McCreery (斯考迪-迈克克里瑞)
[00:11.04]Written by：Scotty McCreery/Frank Rogers/Aaron Eshuis
[00:22.08]Way up in the mountains four thousand feet high
[00:26.86]
[00:27.81]There's a trail through the trees to a cliff where Carolina meets the sky
[00:32.91]
[00:33.93]Oh and there's a view I just can't describe
[00:39.19]
[00:40.11]No I'm not there yet just a few more steps baby wait
[00:44.05]
[00:44.86]Okay you can open your eyes
[00:47.98]
[00:48.91]This is it this is now this is what I've been talking about
[00:54.97]Looking out can't you see forever
[01:00.31]
[01:01.31]Take my hand just take it in
[01:03.86]
[01:04.37]This is a moment we won't forget
[01:06.99]
[01:07.51]On top of the world here together
[01:12.71]
[01:13.85]If there ever was a time for a perfect kiss this is it
[01:20.63]
[01:26.37]Girl I know that you've been waiting and talking to your friends
[01:31.64]
[01:32.55]Wondering if and wondering where and wondering when
[01:37.98]
[01:38.97]Well I've been waiting too holding on to this ring
[01:44.19]
[01:44.78]For the right words to say for the right time and place
[01:47.76]For me to get on one knee
[01:52.52]
[01:53.57]This is it this is now this is what I've been talking about
[01:59.62]Looking out can't you see forever
[02:04.95]
[02:05.93]Take my hand just take it in
[02:08.41]
[02:08.95]This is a moment we won't forget
[02:11.71]
[02:12.35]On top of the world here together
[02:17.29]
[02:18.57]If there ever was a time for a perfect kiss well this is it
[02:25.26]
[02:30.54]This is it
[02:31.36]
[02:37.10]Now you're walking down the aisle
[02:39.88]
[02:43.53]And I can't help but smile
[02:47.52]
[02:49.02]This is it this is now it's what I've been talking about
[02:54.98]Looking out I can see forever
[03:01.18]So take my hand just take it in
[03:03.77]
[03:04.43]This is a moment we won't forget
[03:07.56]On top of the world here together
[03:12.75]
[03:14.28]Surrounded by our family and our friends
[03:18.09]
[03:20.06]If there ever was a time for a perfect kiss
[03:25.03]
[03:28.99]This is it
[03:29.92]
[03:35.14]This is it
data.trans:
[ti:This Is It]
[ar:Scotty McCreery]
[al:Seasons Change]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.04]//
[00:22.08]攀上山巅 四千英尺的高度
[00:26.86]
[00:27.81]林中有条小径通往海边悬崖 在卡罗来纳州的这里 天空仿佛触手可及
[00:32.91]
[00:33.93]这景色 我无法用言语形容
[00:39.19]
[00:40.11]不 还没到目的地 还有几步路 宝贝 再等一会儿
[00:44.05]
[00:44.86]好了 你可以睁开眼睛了
[00:47.98]
[00:48.91]就是这里 就是此刻 这就是我跟你描绘的场景
[00:54.97]放眼望去 你看到永恒了吗
[01:00.31]
[01:01.31]拉着我的手 享受这一刻
[01:03.86]
[01:04.37]这将是我们永生难忘的时刻
[01:06.99]
[01:07.51]我们一起站在世界之巅
[01:12.71]
[01:13.85]此刻就是甜蜜亲吻的最佳时刻
[01:20.63]
[01:26.37]姑娘 我知道你一直在等待 一直在和你朋友讨论
[01:31.64]
[01:32.55]想知道可不可能 想知道何时何地
[01:37.98]
[01:38.97]我也在等待 一直握着这枚戒指
[01:44.19]
[01:44.78]等待一个恰当的时间 恰当的地点 对你说出我的心里话
[01:47.76]在你面前单膝跪地
[01:52.52]
[01:53.57]就是这里 就是此刻 这就是我跟你描绘的场景
[01:59.62]放眼望去 你看到永恒了吗
[02:04.95]
[02:05.93]拉着我的手 享受这一刻
[02:08.41]
[02:08.95]这将是我们永生难忘的时刻
[02:11.71]
[02:12.35]我们一起站在世界之巅
[02:17.29]
[02:18.57]此刻就是甜蜜亲吻的最佳时刻
[02:25.26]
[02:30.54]就是此刻
[02:31.36]
[02:37.10]此刻你沿着教堂过道走来
[02:39.88]
[02:43.53]我无法掩饰喜悦的笑容
[02:47.52]
[02:49.02]就是这里 就是此刻 这就是我跟你描绘的场景
[02:54.98]放眼望去 我看见了永恒
[03:01.18]所以拉着我的手 享受这一刻
[03:03.77]
[03:04.43]这将是我们永生难忘的时刻
[03:07.56]我们一起站在世界之巅
[03:12.75]
[03:14.28]亲朋好友围绕着我们
[03:18.09]
[03:20.06]此刻就是甜蜜亲吻的最佳时刻
[03:25.03]
[03:28.99]就是此刻
[03:29.92]
[03:35.14]就是此刻
